<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sure Feet](/Feats.aspx?ID=56) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 52 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Whether keeping your balance or scrambling up a tricky climb, your hairy, calloused feet easily find purchase. If you roll a success on an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) or an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), you get a critical success instead. You're not [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) when you attempt to Balance or Climb.
name: Sure Feet
